Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Directs the commissioner of the division of criminal justice services to study gender disparity in sentencing outcomes
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the division of criminal justice services to study gender disparity in sentencing outcomes and make a report to the governor and the legislature of their findings, conclusions and recommendations.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of the division of criminal justice services to study gender disparity in sentencing outcomes
